no.ovitas.compass2.search
Interface TopicResultNode

All Superinterfaces:
TopicResult
All Known Implementing Classes:
TopicResultNodeImpl
public interface TopicResultNode
extends TopicResult

Extension of the TopicResult to allow the representation of a result tree.

Author:
Csaba Daniel

Field Summary
static String NULL_RELATION
          Relation name for base nodes.
 
Method Summary
 Collection<TopicResultNode> getChildren()
          Get the children nodes of this node.
 RelationDirection getDirection()
          Get the direction of the relation from the base topic to this topic.
 long getRelationId()
          Return the id of relation that connects the parent of this node with this node.
 String getRelationTypeName()
          Get the relation type name of the direct relation the current topic has with it's parent.

Field Detail

NULL_RELATION

static final String NULL_RELATION
Relation name for base nodes.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

getRelationTypeName

String getRelationTypeName()
Get the relation type name of the direct relation the current topic has with it's parent. In case of base topics this method should return NULL_RELATION.

Returns:
relation type name

getRelationId

long getRelationId()
Return the id of relation that connects the parent of this node with this node.

Returns:
the relation id

getChildren

Collection<TopicResultNode> getChildren()
Get the children nodes of this node.

Returns:
collection of children nodes

getDirection

RelationDirection getDirection()
Get the direction of the relation from the base topic to this topic.

Returns:
the relation direction
